doc:
Jack Hoxie https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Hoxie 0 John Hartford Hoxie (January 11, 1885 – March 28, 1965) was an American rodeo performer and motion picture actor whose career was most prominent in the silent film era of the 1910s through the 1930s. Hoxie is best recalled for his roles in Westerns and rarely strayed from the genre. John_Hartford_Hoxie ( January_11 , 1885 – March_28_,_1965 ) was an_American_rodeo_performer_and_motion_picture_actor whose_career was most_prominent in the_silent_film_era of the_1910s through the_1930s . Hoxie is_best_recalled for his_roles in Westerns and rarely_strayed from the_genre .
